Hello blank fragment Mostly asked questions:

 Question 1: Why the plan is weekly instead a month?

 Ans: Our company is mainly promote the 7 days beauty, if the plan is set in a month, then our customer may feel stressed or lose the track easily.
Question 2: How did the company provide the workout and meal ideas?

 Ans: Our company has many professional nutrients and rich experienced coach! so all the workout and meal provided in the application is safe to follow!
Question 3: Why did the application is invented?

 Ans: Our company wants to provide a great plan for each of the citizens to workout and eat healthy even though they have busy work to do everyday. We hope to remind the citizens that our body health is also essential compare to the work and money we have earned in modern life
License number: AB24484542
 Granted to: UWork
 To conduct the business of: Health and fitness tracker
 Issue Date: 4/1/2021
 Expiration Date: 4/1/2026
